Sentencas: In this work, a kind of thin K-type thermocouple and self-developed CAS-I sealant were used to assembly solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks and temperatures of unit cells inside a planar SOFC stack were measured.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage testing of the stack and characterization of the interface between sealant and components suggested excellent sealing effect by applying the developed method.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: The effect of discharging direct-current on temperature and temperature distribution inside the designed SOFC stack was investigated.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: The results showed that the discharging current had a great impact and the gas flow rate had a slight impact on the temperatures of unit cells.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: Temperature distribution of unit cells inside the stack was much non-uniform and there is a significant temperature difference between various components of the stack and heating environment.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: The relationship between temperatures and cell performance showed that the worse the cell performance, the higher the cell surface temperature.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks

Sentencas: When the stack was discharged at a constant current and the temperature of cell surface was over 950 degrees C, the higher the temperature, the more drop the corresponding voltage.
Titulo: Temperature Measurement and Distribution Inside Planar SOFC Stacks
